title.narrative: Supporting policy framework and strengthening media and information literacy competencies of youth in Pakistan

description.narrative: The program will have two aspects, firstly UNESCO will engage duty bearers on creating a policy framework favorable to media and information literacy to support national development agenda. Secondly bottom up approach will be used to promote civic engagement and democratic participation of youth through building media and information literacy (MIL). The two components are anticipated to complement one another by creating a conducive policy environment and its testing and application by imparting relevant skills to youth. Outputs: Relevant stakeholders will take part in consultation and capacity building workshops on MIL Activities: MIL capacity building workshops: 4 Digital literacy/MIL framework and policy consultation/conference: 1
